text: Lisya () is a rural locality (a village) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 189 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 15 km south-west from Polozovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Lisya
